definition: A field of study and practice that encompasses the use and development of technology to process, store, transmit, and retrieve data and information. It involves the application of various tools, systems, and methodologies to manage and manipulate information effectively. This term is commonly used to refer to the study and application of technology in the context of data processing, computer systems, telecommunications, and related areas.
